short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Beacon Visual Editor is a Chrome extension that empowers Beacon users to seamlessly add navigation, actions, & help documents

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Beacon Visual Editor is a cutting-edge Chrome extension that empowers Beacon users to seamlessly add navigation, actions, & help documents to your Beacon bar. This tool was crafted specifically for Beacon users, enabling them to visually select & add navigations, actions & help docs visually via our WYSIWYG editor. This extension simplifies adding actions to your Beacon bar, an area that may seem complex from our dashboard. This tool is expertly designed for seamlessly integrating actions and help documentation, transforming the way you work with your web applications.

With Beacon Visual Editor, adding functions to your Beacon bar is a breeze. No longer do you have to wade through complex code or tedious steps. The extension provides an intuitive visual interface where you can simply select the navigation and actions you desire to implement in your web app. This visually-driven process brings an unparalleled ease to managing your Beacon bar, saving you time and effort.

Key Features:

1. Add actions, navigation & Help documents: Add any click event, function call, help docs, video, webhook, link, and any other action seamlessly with the visual editor.

2. Visual Interface: Our user-friendly, visual interface allows you to pick and choose actions and navigation tools from your web application with ease. You can even add the help documents with ease.

3. Seamless Integration: Add functionalities without disrupting your workflow. Seamlessly integrate your chosen actions and help docs into your Beacon bar.

4. Time Efficiency: Say goodbye to sifting through code and complex processes. Beacon Visual Editor simplifies the way you work with your web application.

5. Innovative Management: Manage your Beacon bar like never before. Our extension brings a new level of organization and customization to your web apps.

6. Simplification of Adding Functionalities: The extension automatically manages most necessary things in the background, enabling you to add functionalities without the need for intricate coding knowledge.

7. Ideal for Beginners and Advanced Users Alike: Whether you're a newcomer to Beacon or a seasoned veteran, you can utilize our extension to experiment and personalize your workspace, even if your IT team has not yet fully implemented Beacon functionalities.

At its core, the Beacon Visual Editor revolutionizes the way you work with Beacon. Embrace the future of web application management and elevate your WebApp usersâ€™ experience with Beacon.
